price: 55 dans un séjour véritablement merveilleux, auprès d’un Roi omnipotent.
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
